brainly_data.question: Which of the following statements describes rational use of national forests? A.only large businesses should be allowed to harvest trees in national forests. B. there should be no restrictions on the land. C.national forests should be protected to make the best use of the nation's natural resources. D. national forests should ban lumbering completely.
brainly_data.subject: History
